txt.en: You have run out of time

The meat booth is nearly out of bacon! Budgeford is the main supplier for the Farmers Faire, so it is time to make a trip to restock.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>

'Oh no! We are almost out of bacon! Delicious, salty, thick-cut bacon...whatever will we do? Head to Budgeford to find another basket for the market and bring it back as quickly as you can.\n\n'Here...take this pie. It uses my great grand-mother's secret recipe, and it is said to lend you incredible speed when you take a bite of it. Hurry now. Do not tarry!'

Budgeford is two towns east of Bywater, just past Frogmorton along the East Road.\n\nYou should run to the pig farms of Budgeford and return with a basket of fresh, delicious, salty bacon before the time runs out.
'Hurray, [placeholder]! You are the hero of the Farmers Faire!'

Sperling Took, the supplier of the Farmers Faire, can be found in Bywater.\n\nYou should return to Bywater as quickly as you can, taking bites of the pie to help you along if you find yourself needing a burst of energy.
'Hurry, [placeholder]! This is not the time to dilly-dally so!'
Collect the basket of bacon (eat pie for a burst of energy)
Carry the basket of bacon to the Farmers Market
